Frequently Asked Questions:

Which company is Believe made by?
Believe was created by Heart It Out, a Mental Health and Wellbeing organisation based in Bengaluru, India.

Is Believe by Heart It Out free?
The Believe Extension is absolutely free! Quotes and affirmations that help you stay positive are priceless!

Who organises the quotes?
The quotes displayed on your screen are carefully curated by wellbeing experts at Heart It Out to motivate you realistically.
